p: Second, we identify the top 20 users based on number of followers and perform a subjectivity analysis on the aggregate of their respective IDWeek tweets through the use of a recurrent neural network [9]. We provide a median subjectivity score on a scale of 0 (completely objective) to 1 (completely subjective). Typically, an objective tweet conveys factual information, whereas a subjective tweet relays an opinion or belief.
